availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Residence: Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky. Born in Marion County, Kentucky, son of Benjamin Bayless and Elizabeth Wood. A long-time physician in Louisville, where he served as chairman of the medical department of the University of Louisville. Married Virginia LaFayette Browne. Father of Benjamin Bayless, Mary Brown (Bayless) Hobbs, Sallie Galt Bayless, Elizabeth W. (Bayless) O'Bannon, Martha Bullitt (Bayless) Boteler, Maria Duren (Bayless) Lindenberger, George Bayless, Virginia Bayless, and Esther Shephard (Bayless) French.

bibl.p: "Death of Professor George W. Bayless," Louisville Courier-Journal, 10 Sep 1873, 1. ProQuest Historical Newspapers.

Find A Grave, Entry for Dr George Wood Bayless (1817-1873), Find A Grave Memorial # 69212069, Cave Hill Cemetery, Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=bayless&GSbyrel=all&GSdyrel=all&GSst=19&GScnty=1044&GScntry=4&GSob=n&GRid=69212069&df=all& (accessed 13 Aug 2017).
